menu.name: The Original
menu.description: A juicy burger of Swedish beef on toasted sesame bread with original dressing, hickory smoked pepper bacon, iceberg lettuce, sweet onion, tomato and cheddar cheese.

menu.name: Frankensteins monster
menu.description: Made with Kraft's A.1. Thick and Hearty Sauce, melted American cheese, tomatoes, lettuce, mayonnaise, pickles and sliced white onions.

menu.name: The Slap-Your-Face Sauce Explosion
menu.description: A burger that packs a punch with its abundance of tangy, zesty, and creamy sauces that practically burst out of the bun. With each bite, your taste buds will be slapped with a saucy explosion of flavors that will leave you wanting more.

menu.name: The Smoky Sizzler Burger
menu.description: a tantalizing double bacon burger that brings together the best of bold flavors and mouthwatering textures. With perfectly seasoned beef patties, crispy bacon strips, and a hint of smokiness, every bite delivers a sizzling explosion of savory goodness that will leave you craving for more.

menu.name: The Slippery Slope of Cheesiness
menu.description: A gloriously greasy double cheeseburger that takes you on a mouthwatering adventure. With two juicy beef patties smothered in melted cheese, this burger creates a delectable cascade of gooey goodness that will have you sliding down a flavorful slope of cheesy bliss with every bite.

menu.name: The Chortling Chèvre Burger
menu.description: A gourmet delight that combines the richness of a juicy beef patty with the tangy, creamy goodness of chèvre cheese. Topped with fresh arugula and a drizzle of balsamic glaze, this burger creates a harmonious blend of flavors that will have you chortling with joy after every scrumptious bite.

menu.name: The Sweet 'n Sour Onion Overload
menu.description: A burger bursting with contrasting flavors and textures. Featuring pickled red onions and caramelized onions, this mouthwatering creation delivers a tantalizing combination of tangy and sweet notes, elevating the juicy beef patty to new heights of deliciousness.

menu.name: The Towering Triple Meat Mayhem
menu.description: A carnivore's dream come true with not one, not two, but three juicy patties stacked high. Packed with a variety of toppings like crispy bacon, melted cheese, fresh lettuce, ripe tomatoes, and tangy pickles, this towering masterpiece promises an explosion of flavors and a satisfying meaty feast that will leave you in awe.

menu.name: MILKSHAKE
menu.description: Treat yourself to a heavenly delight with our Oreo milkshake. Indulge in the creamy goodness of vanilla ice cream blended with crushed Oreo cookies, creating a luscious and satisfying beverage that will satisfy your sweet cravings.

menu.name: FRIDA: EARLY BIRD
menu.description: Kickstart your day with our FRIDA: Early Bird drink. This invigorating blend of freshly brewed coffee and zesty orange juice provides a vibrant and refreshing morning pick-me-up, perfectly balanced to awaken your senses and fuel your day.

menu.name: OLIPOP
menu.description: Discover a new level of fizzy goodness with our OLIPOP drink. This sparkling beverage combines delicious flavors with prebiotics and botanicals, creating a refreshing and health-conscious choice that will delight your taste buds and support your well-being.

menu.name: CALPIS WATER
menu.description: Quench your thirst with the refreshing taste of Calpis Water. This light and crisp beverage features a unique blend of fermented milk and citrus flavors, resulting in a satisfying and thirst-quenching drink that is perfect for any occasion.

menu.name: POSITIVE ENERGY
menu.description: Elevate your spirits with our Positive Energy drink. Bursting with vibrant flavors and a blend of invigorating ingredients, this refreshing beverage is designed to uplift your mood and provide a boost of vitality, making it the perfect choice for a revitalizing and positive experience.

menu.name: REGULAR FRIES
menu.description: Deliciously crispy and golden, our fries are the perfect side dish to complement any meal. Prepared with care and served hot, they are a mouthwatering indulgence that will leave you craving for more.

menu.name: SWEET POTATO FRIES
menu.description: Indulge in the perfect balance of sweet and savory with our delightful sweet potato fries. These oven-baked golden delights offer a healthier twist to traditional fries while delivering a burst of flavor that will keep you coming back for more.
